mapper.select:
SELECT rnum, emp_id, lwt_dt, lwt_ttl_prg_rt, lwt_rcv_itm, lwt_rcv_qty, lwt_sch_hm, lwt_sch_str_tm, lwt_sch_end_tm, lwt_ttl_wrk_tm, lwt_9, lwt_10, lwt_11, lwt_13, lwt_14, lwt_15, lwt_16, lwt_17 FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, emp_id, lwt_dt, lwt_ttl_prg_rt, lwt_rcv_itm, lwt_rcv_qty, lwt_sch_hm, lwt_sch_str_tm, lwt_sch_end_tm, lwt_ttl_wrk_tm, lwt_9, lwt_10, lwt_11, lwt_13, lwt_14, lwt_15, lwt_16, lwt_17 FROM ( SELECT emp_id, lwt_dt, lwt_ttl_prg_rt, lwt_rcv_itm, lwt_rcv_qty, lwt_sch_hm, lwt_sch_str_tm, lwt_sch_end_tm, lwt_ttl_wrk_tm, lwt_9, lwt_10, lwt_11, lwt_13, lwt_14, lwt_15, lwt_16, lwt_17 FROM tb_lbl_wrk_tm ORDER BY emp_id DESC )
)
